author: IGN
description:
In today's Entertainment Fix: The Simpsons shocks everyone with the death of a core family member of the show in an episode that shows what happens three decades after the present. Will this be a canon event or clash with other episodes moving forward? Also, The Mummy reboot is well under way. The CEO of Blumhouse Production shares his excitement over the movie finally wrapping. Lee Cronin writer and director for Evil Dead Rise is also working on this project so we should expect the scariest Mummy movie yet. 

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN
title: The Simpsons Say Goodbye to Core Family Member in Season 36 Finale - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Kiborg in this latest trailer for the beat 'em up roguelite game. Meet Morgan Lee, learn about the game, and see brutal gameplay. The old-school beat'em-up shooter hybrid puts you into the steel-toe-capped boots of prisoner Morgan Lee, who is staring down the barrel of a 1,300 year sentence for a crime he didn’t commit. The worst part? Death won’t even set him free. One wrong move and “The Last Ticket” that ensures freedom will leave his blood-soaked grip quicker than a regenerative respawn back to the beginning. 

Kiborg is available now on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. A physical edition will be available on August 29, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kiborg - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Even as far back as the Metal Gear Solid series, games helmed by Hideo Kojima have had myriad systems that you could play the whole game without ever taking advantage of. So we wanted to make a video on the best things to do first in Death Stranding 2, and things you should start doing early and often to better understand this weird world you must navigate. Here are 12 Things to do first in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach.

Timecodes
00:00 - Intro
00:31 - Get to Australia and Unlock Fast Travel
01:02 - But Grab Better Shoes, First
01:33 - Keep Checking Facility Rewards
02:19 - Unlock A Sniper Rifle and Silenced Gun
02:59 - Use Stealth and Strands
03:53 - Build Structures on Chiral Network Edges
04:26 - Build Roads As Soon As Possible
05:45 - Always Fabricate Blood Grenades Before Setting Out
06:40 - Claim All The Materials You Can - And Store Them On the Magellan
07:19 - Only Non-Quest Cargo Should Go On the Magellan
07:47 - Take Time To Set Up Map Filters
08:15 - Level Up Sam's Stats
title: Death Stranding 2 - 12 Things To Do First | Best Early Rewards

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official HERBIE Goes To The Movies Feature (2025) Pedro Pascal

description: Take a look at the Dunk & Destruction DLC 2 Trailer for WWE 2K25, the latest action wrestling game developed by Visual Concepts. title: WWE 2K25 - Official Shaquille O'Neal, Tyrese Haliburton, Jalen Brunson & More Trailer

author: IGN
description:
One of the more mysterious shots in the final trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps shows a massive device in Paris. This machine, composed of strange, arcing metal, seems to be beaming energy into the sky. Is this one of the inventions of Reed Richards (Pedro Pascal)? Probably not. We’d guess this device is key to how Galactus is actually going to eat the planet Earth!
Yes, with the devourer of worlds (played by Ralph Ineson) finally getting his due on the big screen thanks to the MCU's first Fantastic Four movie, the question then becomes *how* do you depict Galactus -- a giant who eats worlds -- in a realistic way?

In the comics, Galactus normally relies on a device called an Elemental Converter to help him consume planets. As massive as he is, Galactus doesn’t usually just swallow planets in one gulp. His Elemental Converter helps him break down the matter and organic material of a planet and convert it into sustenance to satiate his endless hunger. And we’re probably seein
title: Is This How Galactus Actually Eats the Earth? | Fantastic Four Trailer Reaction

author: IGN
description:
Check out the creepy teaser trailer for Crabmeat, an upcoming short first-person point-and-click-survival-horror game set in a future Antarctic fisheries region where you are a prisoner tasked with catching the priceless southern king crab. Crabmeat will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Crabmeat - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2 introduces a powerful new customization system called APAS Enhancements, which allows you to fine-tune Sam’s abilities depending on the challenges ahead. In this video, we’ll break down everything you need to know: when APAS unlocks, how to upgrade your memory, and which early and mid-game nodes are worth your time. Whether you prefer stealth, combat, or just staying on your feet with floating carriers, there’s a build path for you.

Learn how to activate and prioritize enhancements, how the Porter System ties into unlocking new perks, and which essential nodes you should target first — including Improved MP Bullets, Simple Noise Canceller, and the incredibly useful Emergency Vehicle Charger.

00:00 - Intro  
00:25 - When Do APAS Enhancements Unlock?  
00:49 - Everything to Know About APAS Enhancements  
01:21 - How to Upgrade APAS  
01:46 - Activating Nodes  
02:21 - Best Nodes to Activate Early  
03:17 - Mid-Game Nodes to Look Out For

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding2
title: Death Stranding 2 APAS Guide: Best Enhancements to Unlock First

description:

Players will once again grind, skate, and embody Officer Dick in the upcoming remaster. A new addition to the games have been added with Constable Richard from London joining the roster as well. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 launches on July 11 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Battle.net).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 - Official 'Officer Dick Returns' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
KILLTUBE - Condensing 108 unique experiments from different fields of expertise into one theatrical anime. 

In 2026, Japan continues its isolation under the Edo Shogunate. Amidst strict social hierarchies, three individuals, treated as scums of society, cross paths in a prison cell destined for a fateful encounter. They join the dueling video platform ""KILLTUBE"" to pursue fortune and to win their freedom in a segregational world.

In an era dubbed the ""Age of Great Duels,"" where one can amass immense wealth simply by defeating the strong, they face discrimination from samurais and merchants seeking power and authority. As they break the limits of convention and claim victory after victory, they rise in popularity, becoming decorated celebrities of their time.
However, just as they reach the height of their fame, they uncover the hidden truth behind "KILLTUBE"...
title: KILLTUBE - Official Anime Expo Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
title: The Thing has a BEARD in the final trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps! #marvel #movie #mcu

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect with new content, features, and improvements coming to No Rest for the Wicked's The Breach Refined patch for the action RPG. The video explores the details of the Realm Tier difficulty, utility runes & fast travel, gem extraction & combat polish, ledge protection & fall damage, better rewards, and more activities. The Breach Refined patch for No Rest for the Wicked will be available on June 26, 2025.

No Rest for the Wicked is available now on PC via Early Access, and coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: No Rest for the Wicked: The Breach Refined - Official Game Overview | Wicked Inside Showcase 3

author: IGN
description:
Knowing is half the battle, the rest is up to you in Overwatch 2 x G.I. Joe. Watch the Overwatch 2 x G.I. Joe trailer to see gameplay and what you can expect with this collaboration with the iconic heroes. Join the Joes in their quest for peace with Genji as Snake Eyes and Freja as Scarlett, or take them down with Reaper as Cobra Commander, Widowmaker as Baroness, and Doomfist as Destro.

During the Overwatch 2 x G.I. Joe collaboration event, complete covert missions through in-game challenges for your chance to unlock new voice lines, sprays, and more G.I. Joe-themed rewards.

Overwatch 2 is available now on consoles and PC. Overwatch 2 x G.I. Joe launches on July 1, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Overwatch 2 x G.I. Joe - Official Gameplay Trailer

description:
Don't miss the Isleweaver Gameplay Launch Trailer for Warframe, the third-person co-op action online shooter developed by Digital Extremes. Players will once again return to Duviri to fight and stop an impending invasion before all hope is lost. Interface with a new iteration of Duviri gameplay, master the arachnid huntress Oraxia, and earn a brand new Incarnon Scythe during Operation: Eight Claw alongside other fresh rewards. Isleweaver for Warframe is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, iOS, and PC (Steam).

title: Warframe - Official Isleweaver Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the fourth episode of Last Sentinel's Developer Diary series! This is an inside look at LightSpeed LA during the development of LAST SENTINEL, their narrative-focused open-world action game set in reconstructed Tokyo.

In this episode, LightSpeed LA breakdown what it takes to build their vision. Here is an inside look into how they crafted their look, sound, and animation for their brand new AAA open world game. 

Presented by LAST SENTINEL
title: Last Sentinel - Dev Diary Episode 4 "Artistry"

author: IGN
description:
Rainbow Six Siege X reviewed by Justin Koreis on Xbox Series X and PC, also available on Xbox One and PlayStation. 

Even 10 years in, Rainbow Six Siege X remains a lot of fun to play, and mastering every Operator will be enough to keep me coming back for more long after I’ve finished this review. With its outstanding Bomb mode as its centerpiece, this is a great option for anyone who likes their shooters with just as much focus on planning and outwitting the competition as there is in beating them to the shot. There are elements like the limits to destructability that show the age of Siege’s underlying technology, and I have concerns about how unlockables ratchet up the pressure to spend on this slightly unconventional free-to-play model. But it’s tough to beat the thrill of a tense match versus another squad of Operators. The X update is a solid step forward for Siege, a great jumping-in point for anyone returning, and just the right spot for those looking to breach these walls for
title: Rainbow Six Siege X Review

description: Join streamers Dawnwhisper and Psyche as they meet to cause chaos in ESO  #sponsored
title: Join streamers Dawnwhisper and Psyche as they meet to cause chaos in ESO  #sponsored

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Guns & Looting' Patch 1.5 Showcase Trailer for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, an open-world first-person apocalyptic shooter developed by GSC Game World. Players can get the rundown on the latest 1.5 update for the game that's set to bring new weapons, such as the Three-Line Rifle and Kora Pistol to the game. The patch is also fitted with quality-of-life improvements, improved Ukrainian lips ync, bigger stashes, and official modding support via Zone Kit. Patch 1.5 is available now for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#Stalker2HeartOfChornobyl #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official 'Guns & Looting' Patch 1.5 Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Sandustry announcement trailer for this upcoming 2D physics/simulation game. In Sandustry, mine, refine, and automate the world in this factory/automation game where every pixel is a physical object able to be harvested and manipulated as players delve deep to discover an ancient civilization’s powerful secrets and learn to love the Sand. Sandustry will be available on Steam.

#Sandustry #Gaming #IGN
title: Sandustry - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Now Streaming on Disney' Trailer for Marvel Television's Ironheart, the latest television series for the MCU starring Riri Williams as Ironheart, distributed by Marvel Studios. Embark on the journey of Riri Williams after the events of Black Panther: Wakanda Forever as she takes her talents back home to Chicago. Marvel Television's Ironheart's three-episode premiere is streaming now on Disney+.

Genius teenage inventor Riri Williams creates the most advanced suit of armor since Iron Man. The story of the series follows the journey of Riri Williams days after her introduction in Black Panther: Wakanda Forever as she rises to the occasion to become Ironheart. She will face many friendly faces in her corner alongside adversaries such as The Hood.

Ironheart stars Dominique Throne, Anthony Ramos, Alden Ehrenreich, Manny Montana, Zoe Terakes, Lyric Ross, and more. The series is created by Chinaka Hodge alongside being executive produced by Ryan Coogler, Brad Winderbaum, and Zoie
title: Marvel Television's Ironheart - Official 'Now Streaming on Disney' Trailer (2025) Dominique Throne

author: IGN
description:
Have you recently finished The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered? Do you want to continue your adventure in Tamriel with friends and near-endless customisation? Then the Elder Scrolls Online is for you! ESO streamer Dawnwhisper teams up fellow creator Psyche to guide her through the early stages of the game, reminisce about Oblivion and show why you belong here in The Elder Scrolls Online. Sponsored by Bethesda.

Special thanks to Dawnwhisper and Psyche
https://www.twitch.tv/dawnwhisper
https://www.twitch.tv/Psyche

#TheElderScrollsOnline #Gaming #IGN
title: An Oblivion Player's First Journey into The Elder Scrolls Online

author: IGN
description:
Why is Resident Evil Requiem returning to Raccoon City? How did the events of the Mansion Incident, involving the fall of STARS Bravo and Alpha Team, lead to the downfall and destruction of the Umbrella Corporation? What's up with Capcom's fascination of a specific North American mammal? All of this, and more, is answered in our Complete History of Resident Evil's Raccoon City.

From the full Raccoon City timeline, to the background of how Capcom named the tormented location, here's everything you need to know about Resident Evil's Raccoon City, and how RE1, RE2, RE3, and Outbreak, are all connected in our behind-the-scenes breakdown.

#IGN #ResidentEvil #RE
title: Resident Evil's Raccoon City: A Complete History - From Sleepy Town to Zombie Nightmare

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Roofman trailer for this upcoming movie starring Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst, Ben Mendelsohn, LaKeith Stanfield, Juno Temple, Melonie Diaz, Uzo Aduba, Lily Collias, Jimmy O. Yang and Peter Dinklage.

Based on an unbelievable true story, Roofman follows Jeffrey Manchester (Channing Tatum), a former Army Ranger and struggling father who turns to robbing McDonald’s restaurants by cutting holes in their roofs, earning him the nickname: Roofman. After escaping prison, he secretly lives inside a Toys “R” Us for six months, surviving undetected while planning his next move. But when he falls for Leigh (Kirsten Dunst), a divorced mom drawn to his undeniable charm, his double life begins to unravel, setting off a compelling and suspenseful game of cat and mouse as his past closes in.

Roofman is produced by Jamie Patricof, Lynette Howell Taylor, Alex Orlovsky, Duncan Montgomery, and Dylan Sellers. Derek Cianfrance, Channing Tatum, Jonathan Montepare, Charles M. Barsamian, Chris
title: Roofman - Official Trailer (2025) Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst, Peter Dinklage

description:
Don't miss the Final Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the latest addition to the MCU about Marvel's first family, distributed by Marvel Studios. Get a new look at Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing in the ultimate fight against Galactus. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is in theaters on July 25.


The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.


Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. author: IGN
description:
Check out this action-packed clip from The Jurassic Game Extinction, "Raptor Chase" releasing on all Digital Platforms, June 24th, 2025.
In the near future, The Jurassic Games is the most popular television show in the world. Every season, 10 death row inmates play a highly advanced virtual reality game pitting them against ferocious dinosaurs in a fight for survival. This season, new host Joy LaFort (Katie Burgess) is about to make her debut when the game suddenly takes on a life of its own. Filled with dinosaur action, The Jurassic Games: Extinction is the follow up to 2018’s The Jurassic Games.
title: The Jurassic Games: Extinction - Official "Raptor Chase" Clip (2025)
